title: Learn With Rakib
description: Learn With Rakib is a learning platform website. April 2023, May 10, 2023 Overview: This project is a client site website, we have developed this project with 9 team members. title: Doctors Portal

title: GariBazer
description: Reselling-Car: an online resell Car service website. I have integrated ReactJS for the Front-End part. December 2022, current I have integrated ReactJS for the Front-End part. Used Firebase for Authentication. The intent of this project is for the user buying to use a Car very easily.In Back-End, I used MongoDB to store website data. To connect MongoDB and the Client site.Live Website | Client Site | Server Site Technologies used: React app, React-router, Firebase, MongoDB, React-photo-view, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, React-toast React-Stripe. I used Back-End Node.js.
